text:
Table: student
Columns:
  - student_id (INT PRIMARY KEY)
  - name (VARCHAR)
  - age (INT)
  - grade (VARCHAR)
  - city (VARCHAR)
Description: basic student table with id, name, age, grade and city.

NL: List all student names and their cities.
SQL: SELECT name, city FROM student;

NL: Show students older than 20.
SQL: SELECT * FROM student WHERE age > 20;

NL: Get names of students with grade A.
SQL: SELECT name FROM student WHERE grade = 'A';
